title: bungeeCord资源
author: love_Minecraft
txt_content: 求一个适用于1.8.8 spigot端的BungeeCord.jar！！！！

replies.author: 张满月
replies.txt_content:
主程序
http://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCor ... rget/BungeeCord.jar
以下放在modules文件夹里
http://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCor ... arget/cmd_alert.jar
http://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCor ... target/cmd_find.jar
http://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCor ... target/cmd_list.jar
http://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCor ... target/cmd_send.jar
http://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCor ... rget/cmd_server.jar
http://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCor ... /reconnect_yaml.jar
